org.tigr.antware.shared.util.test
Class TestIniReader

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      junit.framework.TestCase
          org.tigr.antware.shared.testing.TIGRTestCase
              org.tigr.antware.shared.util.test.TestIniReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
public class TestIniReader
extends org.tigr.antware.shared.testing.TIGRTestCase

The class TestIniReader tests the IniReader class functionality. Presently the following tests are supported:

  1. The testGetSections method tests the getSections method to return all the sections of the INI file.
  2. The testGetValueString method tests the getValueString method to verify that the method returns the correct value for the specified property and section.
  3. The testGetValueVector method tests the getValueVector method to verify that a vector of values is returned for specified section and property.
  4. The testGetMap method tests the getMap method to verify that the entire map representing the INI file is returned.
  5. The testAddValue method tests that the addValue method adds the specified key and value(s) to the hash map of the specified section.
  6. The testGetComplexKeyList method tests the getComplexKeyList method to verify that the correct complex key list is returned.

    Written:

    Copyright (C) 2001, The Institute for Genomic Research (TIGR).

    All rights reserved.

    main

    public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws ClassNotFoundException
    To launch the test from the command line execute the command java org.tigr.panda.util.test.TestIniReader mode=

    Parameters:
    args - a String[] array containing the arguments If the first argument is "--help" the help is displayed for this class If the argument is "text" the test is run in the text mode where output is sent to the standard output. If the argument is "awt" the test is run using the AWT library. If the argument is "swing" the test is run using the SWING library.
    Throws:
    ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs
